sentence.Network_en: It possessed every outcropping of rock, every curve of dune on a barren and gelid shore.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里也有凛冽荒凉的海边那种礁岩嶙峋, 沙丘起伏的景色.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin gelidus, from gelu 'frost, intense cold'

auth_sentence.content: Eventually boots and socks had to be removed and ankles submitted to the gelid waters.
